doc.field: New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records

This subseries contains applications to NYFA's Fiscal Sponsorship program that are categorized as Emerging Organizations, which must be incorporated as a nonprofit on the state level. Applications consist of organization descriptions; project narrative proposals; proposed budgets; and documentation of proposed timelines, audiences, promotional plans, and fundraising strategies. This subseries also includes correspondence, annual progress reports, and promotional materials to advertise specific programming. Materials in this subseries document the individual organizations associated with the fiscal sponsorship program, as well as the breadth of artistic projects supported through it, including visual arts, theater, dance, film, performance art, literature, and inter-disciplinary works.
New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
